source:
%%sql
-- Build OrganisationUnit_dim table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.OrganisationUnit_dim (
    OrganisationUnitID,
    OrganisationUnit,
    Description,
    OrganisationUnitKey,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)

SELECT
    Row_Number() over (Order By T1.Org_Unit, T1.Organizational_Unit) AS OrganisationUnitID,
    T1.Org_unit as OrganisationUnit,
    T1.Organizational_Unit AS Description,
    T1.Organizational_Key12 AS OrganisationUnitKey,
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.Org_unit,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Organizational_Unit,'.'))) as RowID, -- check this
    'Y' as IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY T1.Org_unit, T1.Organizational_Unit
